metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9687 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
PoDoFo 0.9.6 has a heap-based buffer overflow inPdfString::ConvertUTF16toUTF8 in base/PdfString.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9687` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.6+dfsg-5
libpodofo0.9.6 - 0.9.6+dfsg-5
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.6+dfsg-5').
